title: SUMO BUNDLE PRICE BUGGED
body:
Just thought I'd let people know in case this is happening for more people other than myself before they pay too much...
It looks like the SUMO bundle price is bugged it's asking me to pay over 20k riot poiints when I already own every champion and probably more than 70% of the skins, even when the skins remaining aren't on sale added up they wouldn't cost me that much...

replies.body: I noticed this aswell, in the featured part of the store it said I could buy it for 8.9k ish RP, and it comes up as 20k still. (not that I want to buy it lel)
